item.title: Terms of Use
item.description: Ligeet Ligeet is a mobile application for Pharmacies’ services. Table of Contents Terms & Conditions Copy Rights Service changes and updates device security Third parties Internet Connection and Fees Service availablity Terms of Use Basic Terms General Conditions Privacy Policy Information Collection and Use Log Data Cookies Service Providers Security Links to Other Sites Children’s Privacy Changes to This Policy Contact Us Terms & Conditions By downloading or using the app, these terms will automatically apply to you – you should make sure therefore that you read them carefully before using the app.
